questions.question: The difference in water levels of two tanks is 11m which are connected by three pipes in series. L1 = 267m, L2 = 167m, L3 = 230m, d1 = 279mm, d2 = 198mm, d3 = 353mm. Take f = 0.005. Find the discharge considering the minor loss. Refer diagram from simulation.

The difference in water levels of two tanks is 13m which are connected by three pipes in series. L1 = 292m, L2 = 160m, L3 = 248m, d1 = 281mm, d2 = 177mm, d3 = 366mm. Take f = 0.005. Find the discharge considering the minor loss. Refer diagram from simulation.
